mapper.sql: CAR_STATUS_ID, CAR_ID, CAR_VIN, URGENT_STATUS, CAR_TYPE_ID, CAR_TYPE_NAME, BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME, CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, ORDER_ID, ORDER_DETAIL_ID, ORDER_STATUS, DELIVERY_UNIT_ID, DELIVERY_UNIT_NAME, RECEPTION_UNIT_ID, RECEPTION_UNIT_NAME, ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID, ORIGINAL_ORDER_DETAIL_ID, CUSTOMER_CORP_ID, CUSTOMER_CORP_NAME, ORDER_CREATE_TIME, ORIGINAL_DELIVERY_UNIT_ID, ORIGINAL_DELIVERY_UNIT_NAME, ORIGINAL_RECEPTION_UNIT_ID, ORIGINAL_RECEPTION_UNIT_NAME, DESTINED_LOAD_DATE, DESTINED_RECEPTION_DATE, TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID, DRIVER_ID, DRIVER_NAME, CUSTOMER_QUOTED_PRICE, FREIGHT_PRICE, CAR_STATUS_STATUS, SERIAL_NUMBER, CORP_ID

where carstatus.del = 0 and carstatus.CAR_STATUS_ID = #{carStatusId} and carstatus.CAR_ID = #{carId} and carstatus.CAR_VIN = #{carVin} and carstatus.URGENT_STATUS = #{urgentStatus} and carstatus.CAR_TYPE_ID = #{carTypeId} and carstatus.CAR_TYPE_NAME = #{carTypeName} and carstatus.BRAND_ID = #{brandId} and carstatus.BRAND_NAME = #{brandName} and carstatus.CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId} and carstatus.CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName} and carstatus.ORDER_ID = #{orderId} and carstatus.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId} and carstatus.ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus} and carstatus.DELIVERY_UNIT_ID = #{deliveryUnitId} and carstatus.DELIVERY_UNIT_NAME = #{deliveryUnitName} and carstatus.RECEPTION_UNIT_ID = #{receptionUnitId} and carstatus.RECEPTION_UNIT_NAME = #{receptionUnitName} and carstatus.ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID = #{originalOrderId} and carstatus.ORIGINAL_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{originalOrderDetailId} and carstatus.CUSTOMER_CORP_ID = #{customerCorpId} and carstatus.CUSTOMER_CORP_NAME = #{customerCorpName} and carstatus.ORDER_CREATE_TIME = #{orderCreateTime} and carstatus.ORIGINAL_DELIVERY_UNIT_ID = #{originalDeliveryUnitId} and carstatus.ORIGINAL_DELIVERY_UNIT_NAME = #{originalDeliveryUnitName} and carstatus.ORIGINAL_RECEPTION_UNIT_ID = #{originalReceptionUnitId} and carstatus.ORIGINAL_RECEPTION_UNIT_NAME = #{originalReceptionUnitName} and carstatus.DESTINED_LOAD_DATE = #{destinedLoadDate} and carstatus.DESTINED_RECEPTION_DATE = #{destinedReceptionDate} and carstatus.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID = #{transportOrderId} and carstatus.DRIVER_ID = #{driverId} and carstatus.DRIVER_NAME = #{driverName} and carstatus.CUSTOMER_QUOTED_PRICE = #{customerQuotedPrice} and carstatus.FREIGHT_PRICE = #{freightPrice} and carstatus.CAR_STATUS_STATUS = #{carStatusStatus} and carstatus.SERIAL_NUMBER = #{serialNumber} and carstatus.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and carstatus.ORDER_CREATE_TIME BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
mapper.select: select FROM om_car_status carstatus JOIN bd_car car ON carstatus.CAR_ID=car.CAR_ID JOIN om_order ord ON carstatus.ORDER_ID=ord.ORDER_ID JOIN om_order o ON carstatus.ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID=o.ORDER_ID JOIN om_transport_order torder ON carstatus.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID=torder.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID JOIN sys_corp corp ON carstatus.CORP_ID=corp.CORP_ID where carstatus.CAR_STATUS_ID = #{carStatusId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update om_car_status set DEL=1 where CAR_STATUS_ID = #{carStatusId}
update om_car_status set DEL=1 where CAR_STATUS_ID in #{carStatusId}
mapper.insert: insert into om_car_status (CAR_ID, CAR_VIN, URGENT_STATUS, CAR_TYPE_ID, CAR_TYPE_NAME, BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME, CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, ORDER_ID, ORDER_DETAIL_ID, ORDER_STATUS, DELIVERY_UNIT_ID, DELIVERY_UNIT_NAME, RECEPTION_UNIT_ID, RECEPTION_UNIT_NAME, ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID, ORIGINAL_ORDER_DETAIL_ID, CUSTOMER_CORP_ID, CUSTOMER_CORP_NAME, ORDER_CREATE_TIME, ORIGINAL_DELIVERY_UNIT_ID, ORIGINAL_DELIVERY_UNIT_NAME, ORIGINAL_RECEPTION_UNIT_ID, ORIGINAL_RECEPTION_UNIT_NAME, DESTINED_LOAD_DATE, DESTINED_RECEPTION_DATE, TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID, DRIVER_ID, DRIVER_NAME, CUSTOMER_QUOTED_PRICE, FREIGHT_PRICE, CAR_STATUS_STATUS, SERIAL_NUMBER, CORP_ID) values (#{carId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urgentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deliveryUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receptionUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{receptionUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{originalOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{customerCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{customerCorpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{originalDeliveryUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{originalDeliveryUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalReceptionUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{originalReceptionUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destinedLoadDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{destinedReceptionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{transportOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{driverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerQuotedPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{freightPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{carStatusStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into om_car_status CAR_ID, CAR_VIN, URGENT_STATUS, CAR_TYPE_ID, CAR_TYPE_NAME, BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME, CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, ORDER_ID, ORDER_DETAIL_ID, ORDER_STATUS, DELIVERY_UNIT_ID, DELIVERY_UNIT_NAME, RECEPTION_UNIT_ID, RECEPTION_UNIT_NAME, ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID, ORIGINAL_ORDER_DETAIL_ID, CUSTOMER_CORP_ID, CUSTOMER_CORP_NAME, ORDER_CREATE_TIME, ORIGINAL_DELIVERY_UNIT_ID, ORIGINAL_DELIVERY_UNIT_NAME, ORIGINAL_RECEPTION_UNIT_ID, ORIGINAL_RECEPTION_UNIT_NAME, DESTINED_LOAD_DATE, DESTINED_RECEPTION_DATE, TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID, DRIVER_ID, DRIVER_NAME, CUSTOMER_QUOTED_PRICE, FREIGHT_PRICE, CAR_STATUS_STATUS, SERIAL_NUMBER, CORP_ID, #{carId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urgentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deliveryUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receptionUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{receptionUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{originalOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{customerCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{customerCorpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{originalDeliveryUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{originalDeliveryUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalReceptionUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{originalReceptionUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destinedLoadDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{destinedReceptionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{transportOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{driverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerQuotedPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{freightPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{carStatusStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update: update om_car_status CAR_ID = #{carId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_VIN = #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URGENT_STATUS = #{urgentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_TYPE_ID = #{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_TYPE_NAME = #{carTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, BRAND_NAME = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELIVERY_UNIT_ID = #{deliveryUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DELIVERY_UNIT_NAME = #{deliveryUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEPTION_UNIT_ID = #{receptionUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECEPTION_UNIT_NAME = #{receptionUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID = #{originalOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORIGINAL_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{originalOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CUSTOMER_CORP_ID = #{customerCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CUSTOMER_CORP_NAME = #{customerCorpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_CREATE_TIME = #{orderCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORIGINAL_DELIVERY_UNIT_ID = #{originalDeliveryUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORIGINAL_DELIVERY_UNIT_NAME = #{originalDeliveryUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_RECEPTION_UNIT_ID = #{originalReceptionUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORIGINAL_RECEPTION_UNIT_NAME = #{originalReceptionUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESTINED_LOAD_DATE = #{destinedLoadDate,jdbcType=DATE}, DESTINED_RECEPTION_DATE = #{destinedReceptionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID = #{transportOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DRIVER_ID = #{driverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DRIVER_NAME = #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_QUOTED_PRICE = #{customerQuotedPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FREIGHT_PRICE = #{freightPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CAR_STATUS_STATUS = #{carStatusStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SERIAL_NUMBER = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, where CAR_STATUS_ID = #{carStatusId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update om_car_status set CAR_ID = #{carId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_VIN = #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URGENT_STATUS = #{urgentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_TYPE_ID = #{carTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAR_TYPE_NAME = #{carTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, BRAND_NAME = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELIVERY_UNIT_ID = #{deliveryUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DELIVERY_UNIT_NAME = #{deliveryUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEPTION_UNIT_ID = #{receptionUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECEPTION_UNIT_NAME = #{receptionUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID = #{originalOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORIGINAL_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{originalOrderDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CUSTOMER_CORP_ID = #{customerCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CUSTOMER_CORP_NAME = #{customerCorpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_CREATE_TIME = #{orderCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORIGINAL_DELIVERY_UNIT_ID = #{originalDeliveryUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORIGINAL_DELIVERY_UNIT_NAME = #{originalDeliveryUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGINAL_RECEPTION_UNIT_ID = #{originalReceptionUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORIGINAL_RECEPTION_UNIT_NAME = #{originalReceptionUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESTINED_LOAD_DATE = #{destinedLoadDate,jdbcType=DATE}, DESTINED_RECEPTION_DATE = #{destinedReceptionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID = #{transportOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DRIVER_ID = #{driverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DRIVER_NAME = #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_QUOTED_PRICE = #{customerQuotedPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FREIGHT_PRICE = #{freightPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CAR_STATUS_STATUS = #{carStatusStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SERIAL_NUMBER = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where CAR_STATUS_ID = #{carStatusId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select FROM om_car_status carstatus JOIN bd_car car ON carstatus.CAR_ID=car.CAR_ID JOIN om_order ord ON carstatus.ORDER_ID=ord.ORDER_ID JOIN om_order o ON carstatus.ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID=o.ORDER_ID JOIN om_transport_order torder ON carstatus.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID=torder.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID JOIN sys_corp corp ON carstatus.CORP_ID=corp.CORP_ID order by ${orderByClause}

select FROM om_car_status carstatus JOIN bd_car car ON carstatus.CAR_ID=car.CAR_ID JOIN om_order ord ON carstatus.ORDER_ID=ord.ORDER_ID JOIN om_order o ON carstatus.ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID=o.ORDER_ID JOIN om_transport_order torder ON carstatus.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID=torder.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID JOIN sys_corp corp ON carstatus.CORP_ID=corp.CORP_ID where carstatus.DEL=0 AND carstatus.CAR_VIN = #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND carstatus.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID = #{transportOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select carstatus.CAR_VIN AS carVin,carstatus.CAR_TYPE_ID AS carTypeId,carstatus.CAR_TYPE_NAME AS carTypeName, carstatus.BRAND_ID AS brandId,carstatus.BRAND_NAME AS brandName,carstatus.CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId,carstatus.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName, carstatus.CAR_STATUS_STATUS AS carStatusStatus,transfer.BILL_STATUS AS billStatus FROM om_car_status carstatus JOIN bd_car car ON carstatus.CAR_ID=car.CAR_ID JOIN om_order ord ON carstatus.ORDER_ID=ord.ORDER_ID JOIN om_order o ON carstatus.ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID=o.ORDER_ID JOIN om_transport_order torder ON carstatus.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID=torder.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID JOIN sys_corp corp ON carstatus.CORP_ID=corp.CORP_ID JOIN sr_transfer_order transfer ON carstatus.CAR_VIN=transfer.CAR_VIN order by ${orderByClause}

select carstatus.CAR_ID,car.CAR_NAME,carstatus.CAR_VIN,carstatus.CAR_TYPE_ID,carstatus.CAR_TYPE_NAME, carstatus.BRAND_ID,carstatus.BRAND_NAME,carstatus.CATEGORY_ID,carstatus.CATEGORY_NAME,carstatus.ORDER_ID,ord.ORDER_CODE,carstatus.ORDER_DETAIL_ID, carstatus.ORDER_STATUS,carstatus.RECEPTION_UNIT_ID,carstatus.RECEPTION_UNIT_NAME,unit.ADDRESS,u.USER_NAME,u.PHONE, carstatus.CUSTOMER_CORP_ID,carstatus.CUSTOMER_CORP_NAME,carstatus.ORDER_CREATE_TIME,carstatus.DESTINED_LOAD_DATE,carstatus.DESTINED_RECEPTION_DATE, carstatus.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID,torder.TRANSPORT_ORDER_CODE,carstatus.DRIVER_ID,carstatus.DRIVER_NAME,carstatus.CUSTOMER_QUOTED_PRICE, carstatus.FREIGHT_PRICE,carstatus.CAR_STATUS_STATUS,carstatus.SERIAL_NUMBER,carstatus.CORP_ID,corp.CORP_NAME FROM om_car_status carstatus JOIN bd_car car ON carstatus.CAR_ID=car.CAR_ID JOIN om_order ord ON carstatus.ORDER_ID=ord.ORDER_ID JOIN om_order o ON carstatus.ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID=o.ORDER_ID JOIN om_transport_order torder ON carstatus.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID=torder.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID JOIN sys_corp corp ON carstatus.CORP_ID=corp.CORP_ID JOIN bd_unit unit ON carstatus.RECEPTION_UNIT_ID=unit.UNIT_ID JOIN bd_contacts contacts ON carstatus.RECEPTION_UNIT_ID=contacts.UNIT_ID JOIN bd_user u ON contacts.USER_ID=u.USER_ID where carstatus.DEL=0 and carstatus.RECEPTION_UNIT_ID = #{receptionUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select FROM om_car_status carstatus JOIN bd_car car ON carstatus.CAR_ID=car.CAR_ID JOIN om_order ord ON carstatus.ORDER_ID=ord.ORDER_ID JOIN om_order o ON carstatus.ORIGINAL_ORDER_ID=o.ORDER_ID JOIN om_transport_order torder ON carstatus.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID=torder.TRANSPORT_ORDER_ID JOIN sys_corp corp ON carstatus.CORP_ID=corp.CORP_ID where carstatus.DEL=0 AND carstatus.CAR_VIN = #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update om_car_status set CAR_STATUS_STATUS=3 where CAR_VIN = #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update om_car_status set CAR_STATUS_STATUS=2 where CAR_VIN = #{carVin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
